products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Rosewood Pink electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The dusty rosewood pink of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2070 Fabric Colour: Rosewood Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Lipstick Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Lipstick Pink electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The bold pink is a beautiful, saturated pink shade which will work well as a dramatic splash of colour in your room.  
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2052 Fabric Colour: Lipstick Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Blush Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Blush Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Blush Pink is a beautiful light pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Blush Pink electric roller blind is fabulous for hard to reach windows. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2090 Fabric Colour: Blush Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
